exceptions.exn: In environment U, V : NormedModule R_AbsRing U_RInt : (R -> U) -> R -> R -> U V_RInt : (R -> V) -> R -> R -> V a : forall (f : R -> U) (a b : R) (l : U), is_RInt f a b l -> U_RInt f a b = l b : forall (f : R -> V) (a b : R) (l : V), is_RInt f a b l -> V_RInt f a b = l v : R -> prod_NormedModule R_AbsRing U V The term "b" has type "forall (f : R -> V) (a b : R) (l : V), is_RInt f a b l -> V_RInt f a b = l" while it is expected to have type "R".

In environment U, V : NormedModule R_AbsRing U_RInt : (R -> U) -> R -> R -> U V_RInt : (R -> V) -> R -> R -> V a : forall (f : R -> U) (a b : R) (l : U), is_RInt f a b l -> U_RInt f a b = l b : forall (f : R -> V) (a b : R) (l : V), is_RInt f a b l -> V_RInt f a b = l v : R -> U * V X : ?K -> ?V -> ?V a0, b0 : R l0 : U l1 : V H : is_RInt v a0 b0 (l0, l1) Unable to unify "forall P : ?V0 -> Prop, locally (scal (?M3587 - ?M3586) ?M3588) P -> filtermap (fun ptd : SF_seq => scal (sign (?M3587 - ?M3586)) (Riemann_sum (fun _ : R => ?M3588) ptd)) (Riemann_fine ?M3586 ?M3587) P" with "(U_RInt (fun t : R => fst (v t)) a0 b0, V_RInt (fun t : R => snd (v t)) a0 b0) = (l0, l1)".

original: intros a b v. exists (scal (b - a) v). apply is_RInt_const.
